job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: This Jobot Job is hosted by Christine McNamara  Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.  Salary $130,000 - $150,000 per year A global organization dedicated to partnering with companies across multiple industries is looking to expand their data and analytics team by bringing on a Machine Learning Engineer. The role will involve working for one of their most prestigious clients and will have a heavy emphasis on Tensorflow and Kubernetes. If you are a data scientist that enjoys working end to end and the ability to see your work impact an entire industry- this is the role for you! Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
